title: New lion cubs at Lion Country Safari
text:
Video above is WPBF 25 News to Go, a look at the days top headlines and forecast.On Nov. 8, 2019, Lion Country Safari welcomed African lion cubs Atlas and Mara, the first cubs born at the preserve in almost 20 years.The cubs are currently spending bonding time with their mother Leela before making their big debut in the lion habitat. Atlas and Mara are Leela and K'wasi's first offspring.

Video above is WPBF 25 News to Go, a look at the days top headlines and forecast.



On Nov. 8, 2019, Lion Country Safari welcomed African lion cubs Atlas and Mara, the first cubs born at the preserve in almost 20 years.

The cubs are currently spending bonding time with their mother Leela before making their big debut in the lion habitat.

Atlas and Mara are Leela and K'wasi's first offspring.
